## WarpMode enumeration

Specifies the type of warp transformation applied.

```csharp
public enum WarpMode
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Perspective | `0` | Specifies a perspective warp. |
| Bilinear | `1` | Specifies a bilinear warp. |
